p:
The ODE equations of the SEIR epidemiological model are given in Section 2.1 of the S1 Text. The strain specific force of infection, λ
m , satisfies

(2) where β
m is the transmission rate for strain m, implicitly comprising the contact rate and the transmissibility of the virus (the probability that a contact between an infectious person and a susceptible person leads to transmission), and the superscript X ∈ { N, V} denotes vaccination status (indexed by N for non-vaccinated, V for vaccinated).
